thread.title: Lorde got a haircut from the Kardashian go-to stylist, and now she’s giving us indie Kendall Jenner vibes
thread.title_full: Lorde got a haircut from the Kardashian go-to stylist, and now she’s giving us indie Kendall Jenner vibes

author: Jen Juneau
title: Lorde got a haircut from the Kardashian go-to stylist, and now she’s giving us indie Kendall Jenner vibes
text:
Lorde got a haircut from the Kardashian go-to stylist, and now she’s giving us indie Kendall Jenner vibes We can’t get enough of celebrity haircuts — especially when our faves try something totally new and still look totally fab. It inspires us to take the risk too!
Chop chop! Lorde is the latest starlet to jump on the hair-trend train. She chopped her iconic, wild, and gorgeous mane into the trendy ~lob~. And she didn’t just go to the salon, she enlisted celebrity stylist Jen Atkin, aka the woman responsible for Khloe, Kendall, Kylie and sometimes Kim’s hair. 
“The latest victim to my ✂️spree , this angel @lordemusic ,” stylist to the stars Jen Atkin captioned an Instagram photo of the singer. “ Short hair ain’t going anywhere bb’s. (Neither is saying bb).” The latest victim to my ✂️spree , this angel @lordemusic . ✨Short hair ain't going anywhere bb's. (Neither is saying bb) Go to @maneaddicts Pinterest page for more haircut inspo + #MYOUAI hair consult at TheOuai.com to get ur personal product rec's (over 25,000 people have)! I'm sorry I can't respond to everyone's DM's and tweets. Now who is going to Coachella to see this babe in action? ☮️🤘 #IGotNewScissors 
A post shared by Celebrity Hairstylist (@jenatkinhair) on Feb 20, 2017 at 11:42am PST 
Lorde — who is performing at Coachella in April — shared the same photo, captioning it simply, “The perfect crime.”
The not-quite-a-lob, wavy style with a side part is familiar. We’ve seen the gorgeous look on Atkin’s client Kendall Jenner in the recent past. In fact, Atkin recently gave the reality star and model a “#90sLob” that Victoria Beckham would be proud of.
her her her her 
A post shared by Kendall (@kendalljenner) on Nov 7, 2016 at 11:10am PST 
I bring the /✂️'s...she brings the VIBES. ✨ ✨ @kendalljenner #newcutwhodis #90sLob #kendalljenner 
A post shared by Celebrity Hairstylist (@jenatkinhair) on Feb 16, 2017 at 3:31pm PST 
Chrissy Teigen, Kaia Gerber, and Hailey Baldwin are also lucky recipients of her soft, wavy touch
“Warning: I got new ✂️’s and nobody is safe!” Atkin captioned a shot of Teigen at the Grammys last Sunday . Warning: I got new ✂️'s and nobody is safe! @chrissyteigen giving it to us tonite at Musics biggest night ...the Grammys. @patrickta @monicarosestyle @priscillavalles @traceycunningham1 #JenAtkinHair 
A post shared by Celebrity Hairstylist (@jenatkinhair) on Feb 12, 2017 at 7:16pm PST 
KAIA® is just all types of goals @kaiagerber @makeupvincent @monicarosestyle #JenAtkinHair excited for the @marcjacobsbeauty event tonite!! #nyfw #kaiagerber #babewaves 
A post shared by Celebrity Hairstylist (@jenatkinhair) on Feb 15, 2017 at 3:07pm PST 
@haileybaldwin last night for the @instylemagazine GG after party ✨ @robertsesnek @stylememaeve #JenAtkinHair #GoldenGlobes2017 thx to @ghd_northamerica @dysonhair @theouai @kerastase_official @balmainhaircouture for helping me create this look! 
A post shared by Celebrity Hairstylist (@jenatkinhair) on Jan 9, 2017 at 8:01pm PST 
We love these looks and are inspired to rock a shorter ‘do even though we’re still in the winter season. Why not get a head start, right? Spring is right around the corner .
